import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './BookList.css' const Book = (book) => { return (

{book.title}

by {book.author}

{book.ratings_average} -- {book.ratings_count} ratings -- published {book.first_publish_year}

) } export default Book {/* {/*
